sentence-text: We think that cheerleading then is one of the most pure forms of art as it allows individuals to soar through the air in a way that is simply not available in other avenues.

GP-claim-text-for-motion: ending cheerleading limits personal choice.
sentence-text: We think that the value of art comes from individuals individual preference first off, but also simply the miraculous, the splendid.

GP-claim-text-for-motion: ending cheerleading limits personal choice.
sentence-text: We think that cheerleading falls into this category because it allows individuals to go beyond the regular means by working as a group and doing something truly miraculous.

GP-claim-text-for-motion: ending cheerleading limits personal choice.
sentence-text: For this reason, we should not end cheerleading.
